`{% for i in range(1, 11) %}` 
    `{% set property = "collateral_property_address" ~ i %}`
    `{% set status = "collateral_property_" ~ i ~ "_status" %}`
    `{% set value = "collateral_property_" ~ i ~ "_value" %}`

    `{% if status in contact and contact[status].value == "approved" %}`
        `<span><b>Breakdown</b><br>`
          `{{ contact[property] }} valued at ${{ contact[value] }}</span>`
    `{% endif %}`
`{% endfor %}`
found the above solution. if anyone need this, im pasting my code. didnt test it out but primary test was working.
